name: TetrisRush
description:
You are a tetris piece who tries to finish all objects.

Free Assets used in game:

Background = https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/free-snow-mount...

Music =

Sound Effects: 

www.madrooster.co

If you stuck in tetris or anywhere else because of webGL part press "N" for next level, press "M" for restart current level.

Created by es.society team
